job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen, implementeren, verbeteren en onderhouden van AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building, implementing, improving, and maintaining AI and ML/Deep Learning solutions, which are core modeling activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates the application of various ML techniques like image recognition, NLP, speech processing, and recommendation systems, which falls under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwen van model training scripts en data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The mention of building 'model training scripts' and 'data pipelines' points to the operational aspects of managing ML workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en verbindingen maken met data bronnen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the processes of data collection, cleaning, evaluation, and establishing data source connections, which are fundamental data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties (apps, webservices, en evt. andere frontends etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the integration of ML/AI solutions into existing applications, which is a key aspect of software development.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the application of various Machine Learning techniques for tasks like image recognition, NLP, and recommendation systems. It also mentions building model training scripts and data pipelines, and utilizing frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch, indicating a strong focus on core ML modeling and its operational aspects.
